item.title: Choosing a career in bitcoin open source development
item.description: Introduction Why choose a career in Bitcoin open source? My name is Adam Jonas. I work at Chaincode Labs, and I’m here to hunt unicorns. The Current Landscape We’re gonna start off with a couple of numbers that might surprise you. There are roughly a hundred and fifty people in the world that work on Bitcoin open source infrastructure. Around 30 of those work full-time on Bitcoin Core. I’m looking for 31.
